name: Cinema
description:
This is a prototype.

You need a Twitch account to login into the game.

  • Use directional keyboard to move around the lobby.
  • Press [1-5] to use emotes.
  • Use [escape] open/close the stream chat.

Coming on the next releases.

  • Improve the chat.
  • Minigames.
  • More avatars.
  • More emotes.
  • Streamer will able to custom their lobbies and rules.
  • A virtual money, users can get money by watching streaming and they can use it to buy avatars or custom items for their lobbies.
